elements.title: Yellow 2291 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that American black bear Yellow 2291 (pictured) and her cubs are the first family of bears in decades to live in the Santa Monica Mountains?

elements.title: Autumn Colors on the Que and Hua Mountains (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 13th-century Autumn Colors on the Que and Hua Mountains inspired many imitations over the following seven centuries?

elements.title: siege of Jerusalem (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that during the siege of Jerusalem in the First Jewish Revolt, the Romans crucified prisoners in various positions to intimidate the defenders into surrender?

elements.title: Abdelkader Lahmar (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Abdelkader Lahmar was a high school economics teacher before being a candidate for the French Parliament?

elements.title: documentary editing (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that according to the author of a key textbook on documentary editing, a bookstore erroneously assumed that it was related to documentary films instead of archival science?

elements.title: a Thai film (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a Thai film went viral in 2025 after viewers shared videos of themselves crying after watching it?

elements.title: Bob Print (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Bob Print had a reputation for "being an animal"?

elements.title: Arlecchino (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the character Arlecchino in the game Genshin Impact was named after a stock character in Italian commedia dell'arte?

elements.title: Ida Macalpine (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that, to prove that the "mad king" George III was not actually mad, psychiatrist Ida Macalpine sought out his descendants' faeces?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

San Carlos de Bariloche

The Argentine adventure capital offers great opportunities for skiing, sightseeing, water sports, trekking and climbing amidst the amazing mountainous landscapes of Argentine Patagonia.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

Andorra la Vella

Andorra la Vella is the capital of a quirky co-principality lodged in the mountains between Spain and France that offers great skiing, hiking, and lots of duty-free shopping.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

San Diego International Airport

The main airport to America's finest city is the busiest single runway airport in the world.
